entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:44 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:44 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
